Professional Program

Unleash Your Creativity

Explore the wonderful world of visual arts through painting, drawing, sculpture, and mixed media. Our experienced instructors nurture creativity while teaching fundamental techniques in a supportive, inspiring environment.

What Makes Our Program Special

Comprehensive art education that nurtures creativity and builds technical skills

Diverse Mediums

Explore watercolor, acrylic, charcoal, clay, digital art, and more. Find your favorite medium!

Portfolio Building

Create a collection of artwork to showcase your growth and achievements over time.

Annual Exhibition

Showcase your artwork at our annual student art exhibition, celebrating creativity and talent.

Meet Our Art Instructors

Learn from professional artists who are passionate about inspiring the next generation

14+ years teaching experience
Specializations:
WatercolorAcrylic PaintingMixed MediaArt History

Lead Art Instructor & Creative Director

Isabella holds a BFA in Fine Arts from Rhode Island School of Design. Her artwork has been featured in numerous galleries and exhibitions across the region. As an educator, she's passionate about helping students discover their creative voice while building technical skills. Isabella believes that art education goes beyond technique – it's about fostering confidence, self-expression, and seeing the world from new perspectives.

Notable Achievements

  • •Exhibited artwork in 20+ galleries and art shows
  • •Winner of Regional Art Educator of the Year award
  • •Published in Art Education Magazine
  • •Developed 'Art for Everyone' inclusive curriculum
Since 2011

Our Journey

2011

Studio Opening

Opened our first art studio with the mission to make quality art education accessible to all ages and backgrounds.

2014

Program Expansion

Added specialized classes in digital art, sculpture, and portfolio preparation for aspiring art students.

2018

Community Impact

Launched annual student art exhibition and community mural projects, showcasing over 200 student artworks.

2024

Innovation & Growth

Integrated modern digital art tools while maintaining focus on traditional techniques, serving 400+ students.
